items.ja: Caldentey and Smith win PFA player of the year awards
items.en: Caldentey and Smith win PFA player of the year awards
items.text_for_match: Caldentey and Smith win PFA player of the year awards Arsenal midfielder Mariona Caldentey is named the Professional Footballers' Association women's player of the year as her new team-mate Olivia Smith wins the young player award. Arsenal midfielder Mariona Caldentey is named the Professional Footballers' Association women's player of the year as her new team-mate Olivia Smith wins the young player award.

items.ja: Bayer Leverkusen agree loan deal to sign Echeverri
items.en: Bayer Leverkusen agree loan deal to sign Echeverri
items.text_for_match: Bayer Leverkusen agree loan deal to sign Echeverri Bundesliga side Bayer Leverkusen have agreed a season-long loan deal to sign midfielder Claudio Echeverri from Manchester City. Bundesliga side Bayer Leverkusen have agreed a season-long loan deal to sign midfielder Claudio Echeverri from Manchester City.
